markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Khefak Scuttler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1676)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These small creatures are ubiquitous vermin found across much of Akiton.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Khefak_KhefakScuttler.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Khefak Scuttler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1676)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 87</row>

**Perception** +4; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -3
</row>

**Consume Objects** A khefak can gain nourishment by eating objects with hardness 10 or lower. When attacking an object with its mandibles, it ignores the first 10 points of that object's Hardness.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +2 

</row>

**HP** 7

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, burrow 5 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-295" />
name: Khefak Scuttler
